description:
About the Opportunity:

Are you a visionary gogetter who thrives on personal growth Want to be part of an inspiring and fulfilling career to empower individuals worldwide Join our thriving team as we expand our reach! We pride ourselves in our awardwinning Personal Development Programmes online for live and virtual events in over 120 countries.

What Youll Do:
• Spread the word: Craft inspiring marketing campaigns across multiple platforms.
• Connect with purpose: Engage with our diverse audience guiding them towards their potential.
• Grow with us: Participate in weekly leadership calls and training sessions invest in yourself!
• Unleash your potential: Develop valuable skills while managing your own schedule and target regions.
• Become a changemaker: Support new clients on their selfdiscovery journeys fostering positive impact.

Why This Role is Special:
• Unparalleled flexibility: Set your hours and work remotely creating a worklife balance that works for you.
• Meaningful mission: Be part of a global movement dedicated to individual and leadership development.
• Supportive community: Collaborate with a passionate team of likeminded individuals.
• Growth potential: Start parttime and transition to fulltime as you excel.
• Independent contractor role: Be your boss with the freedom and recognition you deserve.

Who Were Looking For:
• Passionate about growth: You believe in selfdiscovery and its transformative power.
• Communication pro: Speak confidently on the phone and Zoom.
• Organized and selfdriven: Manage your time effectively and thrive in an autonomous environment.
• Techsavvy: Navigate common computer programs and social media platforms with ease.
• Coachable and team player: Open to learning flexible and ready to collaborate.

Ready to make a difference Apply now and embark on a rewarding journey with us!

Please Note: Not available for students or recent graduates.
